Description: The technical specifications to refer when using the package. Easy-going, offline supported (via web PWA installation), and detailed oriented. Courtesy from ZORALab's Hestia.

Designs.Description: This component was designed by the following creators:
Designs.Title: Designers

Designs.Description:
This component has the following dependencies (arranged in the order from
left-top to right-bottom):
Designs.Title: Dependencies

Designs.Description:
For HTML, ZORALab's Hestia employs the W3C native syntax for simplicity and
maximum compatibility sakes. ZORALab's Hestia recommends the following HTML code
structure for this component.
Designs.Title: HTML

Designs.Code: ...
Designs.Description: The minimum required HTML codes are shown below:
Designs.Title: Minimum HTML

Designs.Description:
ZORALab's Hestia heavily rely on CSS to style this component and offering its
css variables for customizations. Below are the list of available CSS variables
at your disposal.
Designs.Title: CSS

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --note-box-sizing
CSS PROPERTY : box-sizing
DEFAULT      : border-box (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the box-sizing behavior of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Box-Sizing

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --note-margin
CSS PROPERTY : margin
DEFAULT      : 1.3rem auto (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the margin of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Margin

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --note-padding
CSS PROPERTY : padding
DEFAULT      : 0 (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the padding of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Padding

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --note-border
CSS PROPERTY : border
DEFAULT      : 1px solid var(--color-primary-400) (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the border of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Border

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --note-border-radius
CSS PROPERTY : border-radius
DEFAULT      : .5rem (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the border radius of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Border Radius

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --note-min-width
CSS PROPERTY : min-width
DEFAULT      : initial (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the minimum width of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Min-Width

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --note-width
CSS PROPERTY : width
DEFAULT      : 100% (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the width of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Width

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --note-max-width
CSS PROPERTY : max-width
DEFAULT      : 100% (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the maximum width of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Max-Width

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --note-min-height
CSS PROPERTY : min-height
DEFAULT      : initial (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the minimum height of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Min-Height

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --note-height
CSS PROPERTY : height
DEFAULT      : max-content (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the height of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Height

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --note-max-height
CSS PROPERTY : max-height
DEFAULT      : initial (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the maximum height of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Max-Height

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --note-timing
CSS PROPERTY : transition
DEFAULT      : var(--timing-normal) (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the animation timing of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Timing

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --note-title-font-size
CSS PROPERTY : font-size
DEFAULT      : 2.5rem (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the title's font size of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Title Font Size

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --note-title-font-style
CSS PROPERTY : font-style
DEFAULT      : normal (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the title's font style of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Title Font Style

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --note-title-font-weight
CSS PROPERTY : font-weight
DEFAULT      : 500 (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the title's font weight of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Title Font Weight

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --note-title-text-transform
CSS PROPERTY : text-transform
DEFAULT      : titlecase (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the title's text transformation of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Title Text Transform

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --note-title-text-align
CSS PROPERTY : text-align
DEFAULT      : left (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the title's text alignment of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Title Text Align

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --note-title-color
CSS PROPERTY : color
DEFAULT      : var(--body-color-inverted) (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the title's color of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Title Color

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --note-title-color-print
CSS PROPERTY : color
DEFAULT      : var(--body-color-print) (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the title's color of the rendered component when in print mode.
Designs.Title: Title Color (Print Mode)

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --note-title-indicator-color
CSS PROPERTY : color
DEFAULT      : var(--color-contrast-400) (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the title indicator's color of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Title Indicator Color

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --note-title-indicator-color-print
CSS PROPERTY : color
DEFAULT      : var(--body-color-print) (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description:
Affects the title indicator 's color of the rendered component when in print
mode.
Designs.Title: Title Indicator Color (Print Mode)

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --note-title-background
CSS PROPERTY : background
DEFAULT      : var(--color-primary-900) (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the title's background of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Title Background

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --note-title-background-print
CSS PROPERTY : background
DEFAULT      : var(--body-background-print) (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the background of the rendered component when in print mode.
Designs.Title: Title Background (Print Mode)

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --note-content-margin
CSS PROPERTY : margin
DEFAULT      : 0 (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the content's margin of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Content Margin

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --note-content-padding
CSS PROPERTY : padding
DEFAULT      : 2rem (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the content padding of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Content Padding

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --note-content-color
CSS PROPERTY : color
DEFAULT      : var(--body-color) (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the content's color of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Content Color

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --note-content-color-print
CSS PROPERTY : color
DEFAULT      : var(--body-color-print) (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the content's color of the rendered component when in print mode.
Designs.Title: Content Color (Print Mode)

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --note-content-background
CSS PROPERTY : background
DEFAULT      : var(--color-primary-100) (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the content's background of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Content Background

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --note-content-background-print
CSS PROPERTY : background
DEFAULT      : var(--body-background-print) (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the content's background of the rendered component when in print mode.
Designs.Title: Content Background (Print Mode)

Designs.Description: Fortunately, this component does not use any JavaScript. Relax.
Designs.Title: JavaScript

Functions.Description: Render the CSS output for this UI component.
Functions.Title: ToCSS

ObjectiveAndPurposes.Description:
This package's primary purpose is to provide user interface (UI) styling
specifically for notice values.
ObjectiveAndPurposes.Title: Main Purpose

ObjectiveAndPurposes.Description:
This package was known as 'note_hestiaUI' before ZORALab's Hestia 'v1.2.0'. The
transformation was due to someone attempting to steal the design copyrights and
makes way for programming package's documentation restructuring.
ObjectiveAndPurposes.Title: Legacy Recording

Title: zoralabNOTE Technical Specification - ZORALab's Hestia
